title: Paprika movie site sans
content:
Hi guys, can anyone help me with this image please.

I have a feeling it's Bell Gothic, but it just doesn't seem right for some reason. Can anyone help?

Also, as an aside, does anyone know off the top of their head what I am looking at for the actual film logo. No real reason really, just would be interesting to know.

Cheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [splash\_01\_2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131185541/http:/typophile.com/files/splash_01_2.jpg) | 26.64 KB |
author: bluecube

comments.content:
I believe it's Griffith Gothic, Font Bureau's revival/reinterpretation of Bell Gothic.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/griffith-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131185541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/griffith-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/griffith-gothic/")
nope, the 7 and the R are wrong... i think it is some version of bell gothic as well

The Paprika logo was actually [raised here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131185541/http:/typophile.com/node/31873) last week, but the final verdict was only <cite>(a) a very nice grunge-style hybrid sans and (b) a custom designed logo/typeface.</cite>
